problem_names:
lemma weakCongISym[consumes 1, case_names cSym cSim]:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "Prop P Q"
  and     "\<And>R S. Prop R S \<Longrightarrow> Prop S R"
  and     "\<And>R S. Prop R S \<Longrightarrow> (F R) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> (F S)"

  shows "F P \<simeq> F Q"

lemma weakCongISym2[consumes 1, case_names cSim]:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"
  and     "\<And>R S. R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow> (F R) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> (F S)"

  shows "F P \<simeq> F Q"

lemma weakCongEE:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   s :: "(name \<times> name) list"

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q"
  and   "Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P"

lemma weakCongI:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     "Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P"

  shows "P \<simeq> Q"

lemma eqvtI[eqvt]:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   p :: "name prm"

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "(p \<bullet> P) \<simeq> (p \<bullet> Q)"

lemma strongBisimWeakCong:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "P \<simeq> Q"

lemma congruenceWeakBisim:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<approx> Q"

lemma reflexive:
  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "P \<simeq> P"

lemma symetric:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"
  
  shows "Q \<simeq> P"

lemma transitive:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"
  and     "Q \<simeq> R"
  
  shows "P \<simeq> R"
translations:
lemma weakCongISym[consumes 1, case_names cSym cSim]:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "Prop P Q"
  and     "\<And>R S. Prop R S \<Longrightarrow> Prop S R"
  and     "\<And>R S. Prop R S \<Longrightarrow> (F R) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> (F S)"

  shows "F P \<simeq> F Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F P \<simeq> F Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  Prop P Q
  Prop ?R ?S \<Longrightarrow> Prop ?S ?R
  Prop ?R ?S \<Longrightarrow>
  F ?R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> F ?S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F P \<simeq> F Q

lemma weakCongISym2[consumes 1, case_names cSim]:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"
  and     "\<And>R S. R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow> (F R) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> (F S)"

  shows "F P \<simeq> F Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F P \<simeq> F Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q
  ?R \<simeq> ?S \<Longrightarrow>
  F ?R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> F ?S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F P \<simeq> F Q

lemma weakCongEE:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   s :: "(name \<times> name) list"

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q"
  and   "Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q &&&
    Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q &&&
    Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P

lemma weakCongI:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     "Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P"

  shows "P \<simeq> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q
  Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq> Q

lemma eqvtI[eqvt]:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   p :: "name prm"

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "(p \<bullet> P) \<simeq> (p \<bullet> Q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> P \<simeq> p \<bullet> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> P \<simeq> p \<bullet> Q
by(auto simp add: weakCongruence_def intro: eqvtI)

lemma strongBisimWeakCong:

  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

have "\<And>P Q. P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q"

       P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q

       P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q

this:
  P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q

       P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q

using this:

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
this:

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q \<Longrightarrow>

this:

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q

this:

goal (1 subgoal):

       P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q

proof (chain)
picking this:

  bisim \<subseteq> weakBisim

proof (prove)
using this:

  bisim \<subseteq> weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):

lemma congruenceWeakBisim:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<approx> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<approx> Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq> Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<approx> Q
let ?X = "{(P, Q) | P Q. P \<simeq> Q}"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq> Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<approx> Q

proof (state)
this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq> Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<approx> Q

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>R S.
       (R, S) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
       R \<leadsto><({(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<union> weakBisim)> S
 2. \<And>R S.
       (R, S) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
       (S, R) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q}

proof (state)
this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q}

goal (2 subgoals):

       (S, R) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q}

this:

 2. \<And>R S.
       (R, S) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
       (S, R) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q}

  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "P \<simeq> P"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?P \<approx> ?P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P

this:
  ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq> P

using this:
  ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq> P

this:
  P \<simeq> P

lemma symetric:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"
  
  shows "Q \<simeq> P"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q \<simeq> P

lemma transitive:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"
  and     "Q \<simeq> R"
  
  shows "P \<simeq> R"

have Goal: "\<And>P Q R. \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q; Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> R; P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q R.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q;
        Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> R;
        P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  eqvt weakBisim
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<leadsto><weakBisim> ?Q
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> ?Q \<approx> ?P
  \<lbrakk>?P \<approx> ?Q; ?Q \<approx> ?R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<approx> ?R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q R.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q;
        Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> R;
        P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> R

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?Q;
   ?Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?R;
   ?P \<approx> ?Q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq> R

proof (chain)
picking this:
  P \<simeq> Q
  Q \<simeq> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q
  Q \<simeq> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<simeq> R

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<and>
             Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P;
     Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> R \<and>
     R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> R \<and>
                      R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q
  Q \<simeq> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<and>
             Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P;
     Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> R \<and>
     R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> R \<and>
                      R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P
by(blast intro: Goal dest: congruenceWeakBisim symetric)

proof (state)
this:
  P \<simeq> R

goal:
No subgoals!
